title: Large-Scale Perceptual Fluency Training Program for Improved Surgical Anatomy Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of anatomy and basic understanding of surgical procedures
context.additional_context: Providing hands-on educational environments through smartphone-based simulation/VR content.

learning_goals: Learners can identify key anatomical structures in real surgical videos with 90% accuracy.
Learners can explain spatial relationships of 3D anatomical structures in VR simulation environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can perceive anatomical variations in surgical scenarios with 70% accuracy through perceptual fluency training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
